story.storykicker: The result of CHSE (Council of Higher Secondary Education), Odisha Class 12 arts and commerce exam will be declared today, i.e June 1, at 4 pm. The results published will be provisional and subject to modification after post-publication scrutiny.
story.storybody:
The result of CHSE (Council of Higher Secondary Education), Odisha Class 12 arts and commerce have been declared today, i.e on June 1, at the official website. All those candidates who had appeared for the same, may check their scores at www.orissaresults.nic.in and www.chseodisha.nic.in.

The results published will be provisional and subject to modification after post-publication scrutiny. The Class 12 exams began on March 2 for all the three streams science, arts and commerce, and concluded on March 29.
CHSE Odisha declared the Odisha Class 12 science stream result on May 13. The students who appeared in the intermediate examination will be able to check their scorecards shortly.

(Read: TS ICET 2016 Exam 2016: Results expected to be out today at tsicet.org)

Steps to download the result

  • Log on to the official website, www.orissaresults.nic.in
  • Click on ' Class 12 results 2016 (Arts/Commerce)'
  • Enter your roll number, name and other required details
  • Your result will be displayed on the screen
  • Download the same and take a print out for future reference.

About CHSE:

The Council of Higher Secondary Education, Odisha was established in accordance with the Odisha Higher Secondary Education Act 1982 to regulate, control and develop higher secondary education in the State of Orissa. The administrative function of the Council commenced from September 7, 1982.

Read: CBSE IIT JEE Advanced 2016: Results to be out on June 12

Read: Telangana TS EAMCET 2: Online registrations commence from June 01

For information on more upcoming exams and results, click here.
